New Records: Germany have won their two opening games of a Euros tournament for the first time since 2012
Key Match Events: Jamal Musiala opened the scoring after 22 minutes
Ilkay Gündogan scored the second goal in the 67th minute
Manuel Neuer made a spectacular double-save from Dominik Szoboszlai's freekick
Pre-Game Insights: Manuel Neuer described Hungary as 'an uncomfortable team that tries to tackle aggressively'
Post-Match Reflections: Julian Nagelsmann praised the atmosphere and the emotional boost from the crowd
Ilkay Gündogan praised Jamal Musiala, calling him 'maybe the most important one for us at the moment'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Stuttgart crowd sang Peter Schilling’s Major Tom in unison to celebrate Germany’s qualification to the knockouts of Euro 2024
